help.title: What is Exact Target?
help.answer: A digital marketing company that specializes in helping businesses with their customer data through email, social, mobile, and the web.

help.title: How can I see the map larger?
help.answer: Click on the panel within the pulse window!

help.title: Can I see more colorful links within the Interactive Marketing Hub sidebar?
help.answer: Certianly, feel free to click on the many links and enjoy their different states.
